Reviews.Title: Spy word should've been taken off from ad title
Reviews.Author: Failed Spy Guy
Reviews.Content: The camera works OK as a motion sensor camera, it's small enough to be hidden in day time, ah but the glowing Infra Red led lights beat the whole purpose of the hidden camera (not hidden anymore)The manual it's in well explained English, simple and detailed with some graphics to help you understand better the functionality of the device,also what the other guy said about the 5 seconds trigger video it's TRUE, the manual states 2-3 seconds (Lie) it's actually 5-6 seconds after the cam has been triggered to record somethingplus the glowing led lights, let me put it this way.You open the door,Motion sensor detects you right away(in half second IR led lights turn on) that doesn't mean the cam is recording.you have now 4 seconds to close the door and the camera would record just an empty room for the time you set the camera to recordThe camera worksVideo Quality is goodFPS are smoothAudio/Mic is good and clearTrigger time is 5-6 secondsCustomizable settings are just a few:Time recording:30,60,180/sVideo Resolution:640*480, 320*240Video Quality FPS:10,15,30FPSTime/date stamp on videoIndicator Green light On/Off while recordingDescription of the camera on video I guess (in case you have several around the house to see to which camera corresponds selected video)What it misses in the settings or should've been added too:On/Off IR led lightsSelect # of IR led lights to be activated on triggered cam: 0,1,2,4,6 or the whole 8,(seriously, the 8 IR led lights give great illumination to the night vision camera(more than enough I would say), but they show to the intruder the camera location and what it is at first sight)and that beats the whole purpose of the SPY/HIDDEN camera,so,NO, this is not a night vision "SPY" "HIDDEN" cam,maybe a daytime spy cam or just a motion sensor night vision camera,Battery Life is stated to last about 10 days,Haven't get thru that yet, I'll review that Later

Reviews.Title: Does the Job
Reviews.Author: DL
Reviews.Content: It took some time to find exactly what I needed and fortunately this little gadget fit the bill precisely.It works exactly as described. It's early days yet - but it seems to be robust and well made to last a long time.The short videos it creates are time stamped - which is what I was looking for - and can view something in absolute darkness.The videos are a bit over exposed as they need to be to catch the tiniest of light sources. I don't intend to do anythingexcept keep track of animal movements at night - so the videos are just fine for me.The instructions are clear. But, they tend to assume that the reader is completely aware of what they are referring to.In order to set the time and date stamp (which works very well) you need to create a small .txt file and transfer it intothe folder of the camera.For those confused by this - on a Windows machine (sorry can't speak to what is needed on Macs, . .) in the 'Accessories'folder in the programs of the Start Menu, you should find 'Notepad'. This is what you would use to create the .txt file with thecurrent date & time. (The text you type in and save is completely spelled out in the instructions, . . .)Once created and saved - you drag and drop it into the camera folder after you have connected the camera to ]your pc. That's all there is to it.One note - this may be tripping up some trying to set the time and date - The time that needs to be set is based on a24 hour clock (which most of the world uses, . .) as opposed to a 12 hour clock that we use in the States. So 5PM iswritten as 17:00.  This may be one of the reasons setting the time hasn't worked for others.

Oh well, I thought, I'll give it a try and if it doesn't work I can always throw it into the vast pile of other useless electronic junk that I seem to be addicted to buying off of the internet.Using the factory settings for video capture time (30sec), I mounted the camera on a tripod, in our kitchen, and aimed it in the vicinity of where we've been seeing evidence (droppings, puffballs of fiberglass insulation, etc). I turned the unit on at 11pm and went to bed not expecting much.After waking up the next day, I went about my business, not being overly excited about the camera; still convinced that it couldn't possibly be sensitive enough to detect a rat. I finally got around to retrieving the camera and attaching it to my PC with the included video cable (BTW, my unit did not come with a memory card, and had to purchase a 4GB one from Best Buy for $13 + tax. Be sure to buy one from Amazon as the price can't be beat).Anyway, after attaching it to my PC, I opened up the camera's folder, and there were 15 videos, ranging in time from 30 sec to 90sec. Could the camera have actually caught one of the little son-of-a-guns?, I wondered? With anticipation, I opened up the very first video file and was pleasantly startled to see what I saw. There it was in all it's tiny glory, skittering around my kitchen floor, thumbing it's wiggly little nose up at me!Based on my new-found knowledge of his whereabouts, I'm in the process of putting together a party for my little friend - a party from which he'll hopefully never return!

Reviews.Title: Nifty little device
Reviews.Author: Matt W
Reviews.Content: I've been using this for a few weeks to watch for people snooping around my work cubicle after hours.  So far I'm fairly impressed - the device works as advertised.Pros: - Excellent battery life, I have left it unattended for several days at a time. - There is a tripod mount on the back of unit, but I haven't tried it yet. - Very small package - does not look overly conspicuous. - Included rubber stand allows for easy positioning - Incredibly easy to use once configured - just turn the switch "on" when you want it active. - The night vision, while I have only tested it once, is surprisingly pretty good.Cons (mostly already covered) - The instructions are not very clear. - The field of view is not very wide - I'm only able to capture about 1/2 of the area in my cubicle. - When in pitch dark, the IR LED's light up for the night vision to work.  The IR's are not invisible - they emit some low red light, which to me was clearly visible in a mostly dark room - this makes it somewhat conspicuous in the dark. - There is a definite delay in time to start recording.  This is the price for long battery life - the device is in "standby" until it detects motion, so there's a delay for things to get rolling.  Typically a person is fully in frame by the time recording starts.  I don't think it's a big deal personally, but expect the first 2-4 seconds of an "event" to be missed. - Connecting it to my PC is rather flaky using the built-in USB port.  I usually remove the microSD card and use a separate microSD reader to access the stored videos.And here is a rough setup guide that may help those who struggle with the included directions:1) Acquire a microSD card that is at least rated as "Class 6" - I bought a 16 gig one from a different online site.  It is NOT included.2) You must be able to access this microSD card as a drive on a Windows PC - either by following the included directions for activating the "removable storage" on the camera, or the much easier method - use a microSD USB reader.  Many microSD cards come with a reader.3) The camera comes with a small CD containing a setup executable (.exe) file.  You must copy this setup file to the microSD card.  Do NOT launch the setup program from the CD - copy it to the microSD card, and then put the CD away - you won't need it anymore.4) From the microSD card, launch the setup program that you just copied.  Here you will set resolution, frame rate, and date/time.  Click the "save" button.5) The program will instruct you to reboot the camera.  If you are using an external card reader, take the card out and put it into the camera - remove the battery cover and gently pull the battery aside to expose the microSD slot.  If you are not, then disconnect the camera from the USB cable and thrn it "Off".6) Wait a few seconds, then, turn the camera switch to "On".  Set it somewhere, dance around in front of it, whatever, to test it.  I would recommend running it for several minutes, some of that time spent moving in front of it, and some of that time spent out of the field of view, to give it a thorough test.  The camera generally will NOT save the video it is CURRENTLY recording, so if you just turn it on, move around, and turn it off, the camera will not save any videos.  You must allow it to reset to standby at least once for it to write the video to the card.7) Turn the camera off and move the microSD card to your reader (or, follow the directions to put the camera in mass storage mode).  Open the "VIDEOS" folder on your SD card.  There should be folders sorted by date, and then videos within for each motion detection, the file name being the timestamp.  Make sure you can play them.

Reviews.Title: Somewhat impressed
Reviews.Author: morfeus4
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera to put into my car and everything works fine except the motion activation takes too long to activate.  If you walk at a normal pace past my car then the activation is too slow to catch the motion.  If you linger for more than 5 seconds, only then will it will catch the motion.  I have an internal motion activation system in my house that senses motion instantly even in the dark.  I guess I am used to INSTANT motion detection and this camera has 5 SECOND DELAYED motion detection. I was able to set the date very easily, the battery does last for over 50hrs continuous before recharging as promised and it does film in complete darkness.

Reviews.Title: Motion-Activated Mini Spy Camera with Night Vision and 10-Day Battery Life
Reviews.Author: George Wey
Reviews.Content: Motion-Activated Mini Spy Camera with Night Vision and 10-Day Battery LifeThis is a generic Motion-Activated Camera with Night Vision. Have not used it for 10 days straight yet because I used it for 12 hours and the battery ran out.I assumed it was user error because there is no way to tell if the battery is fully charged! I plan to charge it over night and try again...Also don't waste your money on a 32gb memory card because the camera over writes the old files anyways.A 8gb is enough to where the battery will run out (10 days on standby) before the card is full. (a 32gb card if the camera is always plugged in)According to the user manual, 7mb for a 30 sec video for 10 days will not exceed 8gb. At which point you will have to charge the camera anyways.Calls for a Micro SD card class 6 or higher so avoid the common class 4 cards that are always on sale...Only complaints: When the subject is close to the camera the IR lights over expose them, the detection is on average 2-4 seconds before recording starts, the IR light and blinking light on the front are obvious in the dark.Quick fix: put the camera further away or higher up, aim the camera in advance of where the subject will be so the camera sensor can detect them and by the time recording starts they will be entering the frame, obvious lights: black marker on the IR lights and some electrical tape over the blinking light.UPDATE 4/25/2012: The battery lasts about 8-10 days after a full charge. Then the life of the battery diminishes to about 4-5 days after a few recharges. I have two units, both are having same battery issues!

Reviews.Title: perfect design, but practically useless..
Reviews.Author: bolet
Reviews.Content: i am very disappiontedwith this product. first they sent me one which wldnt even start, then they nicely replaced it,. the performance was all i needed...clear vidoes with wide coverage, but it lasted only 3 recordings and that was also gone! such a waste of 150 dollars! and i really need this product! what else is there that works and has similar options? somebody please help!!

Reviews.Title: Don't waste your money ...
Reviews.Author: Dr. L. hogue Jr.
Reviews.Content: Ive not written a review on any products I've purchased over the years from Amazon because Ive always been satisfied with them ...This product is such junk that at 0100hrs in the morning I felt compelled to write a review so that no one else wastes their money ...Product arrived timely from Amazon 2 days. Upon opening it I found the packaging to look like the cheesy China stuff you see in the dollar store...Packaging says 2-32GB TF cards..IM not sure what that means No card is included nor were there options for the color bases it shows.There is no wall mount that comes with it as advertised on their site...I only saw a slot for one micro SD Card ( must be ordered separately) Inside the highest quality item is the rubber stand that holds the cam. The cord, power pack, battery and cam itself are cheaply made for $135.00. I can't speak for the battery life this early in the game since we just purchased it.The directions are a nightmare. The 1 page 2 sided directions you'll never understand ...for example "Step 4 Check videos" makes no sense ..Turns out you have to set up a txt file and put date and time on it and then put it on the micro card after you've accessed it through your computer ..We have a new Macbookpro on Lion ..Says it works with Macs  ...Well the mini cd provided with the software and second manual you need to set this up won't fit in the computer dvd slot so its useless. So id say it doesn't work with macs...I did read where one buyer was able to email SpygearGadgets and get them to send him a file via email ..I can only get a answering machine that says to leave a message. Technical support seems unfounded let alone lifetime service ..I really have to question the value of the 1 year manufacturer warranty. However, I will hold Amazon to it ...Spygeargadgets web site says their products are made in USA of highest quality ...This was not made in the USA nor was it packaged in the USA ...Re Instruction Manuals:Page 2 of guide talks about upgrading software on DVR ...They ask you to put in cd and click on config.exe and copy this supposed file to your micro card root directory ?? Root directory is what?Im not sure who wrote the "USER GUIDE" but it too looks like someone not fluent in english tried to convert another language to tell us how to set this thing up..Heres an example.."Note: The exact instructing, Please as CD-software manual" What does that mean?  or how about this "Exception Clause: We don't guarantee for the document veracity, reliability or any content except regulate in proper laws. Including no guarantee for product suitable market or  suitable area promise" Meaning what ?One of the two files on mini cd is a 3 page "Software Manual" now this is different from USER Manual that comes in the box. Very confusing directions to add to confusion of the other manual ...Again if you can understand what the person is trying to tell you ...I couldn't.I spent 3 hrs trying to figure this out ..finally searched net and read someone else's directions on how to set this thing up...how to set the date and time, how to set up files and how to view them etc..As for the quality of the video ..for darkness at night video seems to be pretty good and sound is good..once you get it working ...It takes a least 5 seconds from first movement to actually come on and about the same when movement has stopped to stop. It is motion activated Sound alone will not activate it ...Many so-called 'spy shops' sell bargain rate hidden cameras and low-tech surveillance gadgets; toys that are as useless as they are cheap. But if you have a serious predicament, you need professional-level, high quality equipment and a support staff with trained expertise.On their Web Site they state....which I seriously beg to differ on ...."At Spy Tec, we pride ourselves on stocking only the highest quality, state-of-the-art spy and surveillance equipment such as Hidden Cameras, GPS tracking Devices, Nanny Cameras, Spy Accessories,  Bug Detection Devices and much, much more.Whether you are in the corporate world, a small business owner or a concerned parent, Spy Tec's discreet and knowledgeable staff of security experts will provide professional advice."In summation I'm truly amazed that any seller especially AMAZON would sell such poor quality device with such poorly written instructions that aren't even in proper English.For $135.00 I expected a lot more ...Most likely will return product and look at higher end products and spend $300-$400 to get something that doesn't seem like a cheap plastic toy from the dollar store.I would encourage AMAZON to take a serious look at this product and its instructions and discontinue selling this over priced poor quality CHINA junk that tarnishes their reputation.

Reviews.Title: Great Cam for the money!!
Reviews.Author: Simon Mall "Will Salem"
Reviews.Content: This is a GREAT spy cam for the money.  A drawback is the infrared lights that show in the dark when using night recording.  Guess what???  Improvise and cover them with black duct tape.....  Problem Solved!If you want perfection then spend $400 and UP ....  This camera has a 10 day standby time.  I've tested it and it's true!!!Well Worth the money.

Reviews.Title: THIS IS A KNOCK OFF PRODUCT!!!!
Reviews.Author: Disappointed!
Reviews.Content: Do NOT buy this product unless its SOLD by Spygear Gadgets.  I made the mistake and bought it from another seller.  It arrived in a bare box (no brand name) with one page instructions (which were awful).  It was a piece of junk.  I immediately looked up the number of Spygear Gadgets online for help with this junk.  They advised me that it was not their product.  Apparently, there are other sellers trying to sell a "knock off" version of theirs.  He was able to describe mine to the "t."  I have called Amazon about this and they assured me they would look into it and get to the bottom of it.  Its fraud -- no question about it.  Before you buy this camera, call Skygear Gadgets and MAKE SURE you are buying the right one!  It should be $115 (around).  If its $85, you have the knock off.

Reviews.Title: Hate this product and very desapointed because it is a knockoff and not original.
Reviews.Author: B. Littlefield
Reviews.Content: This review is from: SpygearGadgets Motion-Activated Camera with Night Vision and 10-Day Battery Life (Electronics)The description said this had a 4hr battery capacity and up to 32mb of recording on a card. The most I could get was 45min and 1.5mb b-4 the battery would die. I called SpygearGadgets and they told me I had an inferior knockoff and not their product. I am very disappointed with this product and Amazon for not allowing me to publish my true and complete review.

Reviews.Title: NOT THE REAL THING
Reviews.Author: Josefa Villaflor
Reviews.Content: This evaluation has nothing to do with Spygear Gadget product because the product shipped to me was not the genuine product.  I contacted SpyGear  because the instruction and the product does not make sense. They promply responded and showed me the picture of the box that the product should look like.  It should show their company name.  The product I received did not have anything that showed that it came from Spygear, nor the company that made it.  There was no tech support number if you need help. So I contacted Amazon and they gave me the website and phone number of Spygear.  The inconvenience is irritating especially if you rely on a reputable company like Amazon and you get the counterfeit version.

Reviews.Title: Bad reviews regarding indicator light and trigger time not true with latest version
Reviews.Author: Fhteacher "Fga4"
Reviews.Content: I saw all the reviews about how the indicator light makes the spy cam effect impossible but I needed the camera for animals so that did not matter to me. There was also a complaint that the camera triggers in 5 seconds.  When I got this version of the camera the software in the configuration file allows the indicator light to be turned on or off. You can also set the duration, FPS, etc. You can also use the device plugged into the wall to get a faster response time.  I tested it and the indicator light does not come on if desired. the device triggers in 2-3 seconds when plugged in the wall and the device includes a wall charger. Of course, you cannot tell if the unit is working w/o the indicator lights because you have no lights!! It does film and you can tell when you run the videos. Putting in the little memory card is no more difficult than putting in a cell phone sim card and just follow the directions in the manual to set the configuration and things work fine.

Reviews.Title: disapointment
Reviews.Author: Bridgette
Reviews.Content: Camera doesn't work, instructions included do not work, instructions from other reviewers didn't work for me either. There is no number to contact for customer support, because this is not a legitimate spygear camera its actually a generic version hence the lower price. Took forever to get here not the sellers fault though because I was not aware this would be an international shipment. (not shipped in the us). There wasn't any tracking info available either. If you do require a camera save yourself the time, effort, and headaches. I could have installed an entire security system myself in the time I have spent just trying to get this camera to work. Wish I would have paid more for the legitimate Spygear camera.

Reviews.Title: Awesome camera
Reviews.Author: S. H. Feld
Reviews.Content: I purchased one of these cameras to spy on my cats, who do bad things when it's dark or nobody is watching.Following the directions it was very easy to set up the camera, though I haven't got the date set right yet.I charged the battery for a few hours (that's one annoying little thing; they don't tell you how long you shouldcharge the battery and I don't think there's an indicator that tells you when it's fully charged,) inserted themicro SD card that I bought at Staples, and I was in business. I mounted the camera on my regular cameratripod (the cats thought it was a toy when it was just standing on the ground,) turned it on, and let it run.In 18 hours it had stopped filming, but there were a heck of a lot of 30-second videos of my cats being cats,so perhaps I hadn't charged the battery fully, or the SD card was full. I plugged the camera into my computer and used Windows Media Player to run throughall the videos. The video and sound quality were better than I had expected. The camera had good focus from 10 feet away up toabout one foot from the lens, and the details were clear enough to be able to tell all the cats apart, even in the night shots.The motion detection had no problem picking up even our little six-pound cat.I'm very happy that I bought this camera.

Reviews.Title: Quality but not perfect
Reviews.Author: Hicoteo
Reviews.Content: This is a very good quality product. Its very well packaged, the software is easy to install and the camera is easy to set up. The camera itself is quality plastic and very solid. The video quality and sound is also very good. The infrared motion sensor is great. It means that it doesn't turn on unless there is something or someone to trigger it. Unlike other cameras that seem to turn on for nothing.The night vision doesn't work at all. The manufacturer would be wise to make a new, and cheaper model, without it. Also, it does not last 10 days on standby. When the battery is fully charged you are lucky to get 7 days out of it. This feature was the reason why I bought it so I'm very disappointed.Update: I drilled a hole in the battery cover, cut the battery wires and passed them through the hole. Then, I soldered a larger battery, with the same voltage, to the wires and glued it to the back of the camera. Now the camera lasts more then 10 days on a single charge! (See Pictures)23/09/13: I had some difficulty charging camera and downloading photos. If this happens check your USB connection or change the cable.Dec.2013: I was having too much trouble accessing the memory and charging this little device so I trashed it. I think the USB port had a short or something.

Reviews.Title: Works
Reviews.Author: Sandra S. Moore
Reviews.Content: Works perfectly.  Was easy to connect to my desktop to see what photo videos were taken.  Low light works well enough that you can see object being caught on camera.  No idea how long the battery can really go without recharging but I've had mine set up 4 days without a charge going bad.  Perfectly satisfied with this little camera.

Reviews.Title: Hope this helps!
Reviews.Author: MsMTMTE
Reviews.Content: OK, I think I can help you decide if this is right for you. I read a lot of reviews about a lot of cameras available on Amazon, & I eventually got this one based on my needs & the various reviews. I am pleased with it. Be aware that you need to also purchase a microSD card for this camera (with adapter). The Amazon site says you need a minimum class 4, but the product camera booklet says class 6. However, I did get a 32GB class 4 and it works fine for me.I relied heavily on other reviews to get the setup right. It's a little confusing but not overly complicated. It's just that I had to bypass the way the included instructions say to do the setup, as have some other customers and the directions for doing that aren't included with the camera. I was able to get this working relatively quickly considering the problems I had. It took following the troubleshooting advice of 2-3 others who were kind enough to share in their product reviews with instructional fixes. I'll try to summarize here.My advice is to first try following the included directions. If it doesn't work as instructed, follow my procedure (& check for other helpful reviews if you're still stuck). I suspect that following the stock instructions would go smooth for someone working with an older version of Windows. I have an older computer, but really wanted to use my new one so...I persevered & got it working just fine. Please don't be discouraged if you like this camera. I'll explain how I did it so hopefully this helps you. The camera, cord & desk stand are good quality.Problems I encountered: #1 Getting the microSD card into the camera's slot. It took some finesse to line up the tiny card & then to push it in just right so you feel & hear the spring-loaded lock "click" in place. It got stuck a few times w/o me hearing the "click" & I didn't want to take a chance that it wasn't lined up right so I used a small pocket knife & firmly but gently pulled out the mini card, then lined it up more carefully next time. It takes a bit of patience & either strong finger nails (I don't have) or something like a metal dog tag edge or the dull edge of a small pocket knife to push it in & sometimes to pop it out. It was tricky at first but with just a little practice it became much easier & now it's no big deal.#2 Camera set-up: Transfering the config.exe file to the camera & time/date set-up: (Note: The user manual procedures for initial camera set-up are explained AFTER things like camera operation & viewing recorded videos, so you'll be jumping around a bit). Try following the included directions. If that method fails, try this: I couldn't get my computer to read the camera's USB cord as a storage drive, so I had to bypass that set-up method. I took the microSD card out of the camera and (w/ adapter) put it directly into my computer's SD slot. From there, I was able to see the video camera's (empty) storage card. First, you need to copy the config.exe file from the included CD to the camera's memory card (just copy & paste). Now, open the camera's memory card & double-click to run the config.exe file. You should see the screen that lets you choose recording options & time/date. If you're able to enter the time/date here then do so. For some reason, in order to get the time/date set, I then had to take another step (as instructed in another review) I opened Windows Notepad and typed (& saved) a file that set the Time/Date (using the format described in the instructions that came with the camera) then I cut/pasted the Notepad Time/Date file into the memory card for the camera. I returned the microSD card into the camera, then began the test videos.roblem #3: When I first tested it out, I thought it failed because I only video'd myself in front of the camera just once & immediately checked for the video file, but there were no video files. Then I read another review from someone who advised that the first video taken will not write to the camera until there's a second video, so I repeated the process, activating the camera filming for about 20-30 seconds then turning it away from me and so on, about 4 times and voila! It worked perfectly.I used this camera to catch my dog peeing on the carpet in the middle of the night to see her routine and make a plan to correct her behavior. It works well for that. It's not really a Spy camera because it not truly hidden & the IR LED's glow red in the dark so you can't stick it in a window (at night) to look out because of the LEDs reflection. It's good for daytime, or for monitoring your room if you have roommates, or your home if you have construction, sitters, etc...It could easily be somewhat disguised as a toy with some felt, craft supplies & ingenuity. It might not even be recognized as a camera to a novice theif, so I see value in this product. I will eventually be buying other types of cameras for live viewing and home security.I would take this camera on a vacation and leave it in the hotel room aimed at my valuables. I've had a maid at a 5-star hotel in Cabo San Lucas rip off a bunch of $20's from my dresser before, but couldn't prove it. Wish I had this then. The concierge actually spent the entire vacation telling me he'd get me the key to my safe "in just a Mexican minute" & chuckled (wonder what his cut was?). If I had video evidence, I'd have got it back. Also, I lived on Oahu for 3 years & know that if you're vacationing in Hawaii with a rental car, unfortunately the youthful &/or ice (meth) addicted locals do break into trunks frequently (even while parked in the hotel lot!) & I think tucking this camera in there w/ some velcro would work well. Good luck finding what works for you & thanks to those who helped me with their reviews!

Reviews.Title: Works as advertised, but...
Reviews.Author: Panic Azimuth
Reviews.Content: ...the device will not work for me, because the IR lights stay on in normally-lit rooms, over-exposing and washing out all of the detail in the objects it's pointed at.  It does turn off, but only if you actually aim it at a light source.  Maybe it's a bad photo sensor, but the unit I received didn't work for my purpose.  Returning to seller.

Reviews.Title: Defective, already returned...
Reviews.Author: J. Guglielmi "mamagug"
Reviews.Content: I bought this item (even after reading some poor reviews, decided to give it a chance).  It simply didn't work in light or dark areas, but I will say that the return process was extremely simple and refund processed immediately.

Reviews.Title: would like to know
Reviews.Author: Don
Reviews.Content: I Bought the Motion-Activated Mini Spy Camera with Night Vision and 10-Day Battery Life. Its a good camera but it didn't come with user manual.Could anyone tell me how long to charge the battery and when you know it is fully charged

Reviews.Title: Motion Activated Mini Camera
Reviews.Author: suebet
Reviews.Content: The camera works fine. I have not had to use it on a battery as I had a place to plug it in.  It is small and easy to turn on and off.  The only problem I had is that I do not think the instructions that came with it are very good.  I guess if you are good with electronics that might not be an issue.  I still have not been able to set the date on the camera.  However, the camera itself works fine.

Reviews.Title: Motion-Activated Camera with Night Vision
Reviews.Author: william
Reviews.Content: The  Motion-Activated Camera with Night Vision, does what's advertised greatly. The only drawback I found was having to remove the back cover, thenlift the battery to gain access to the SD card for media storage. Overall, this camera is more than worth purchasing.

Reviews.Title: Some helpful info...
Reviews.Author: anthony bray
Reviews.Content: The trigger time for the camera to start is about 2 seconds, and the distance was about 25 feet away. It has a little red / green light when in operation, but I covered the spot with a little electrical tape and it was no longer visible. The motion sensor doesn't work thru glass. Was easy to connect to Mac and view the videos. For the price it is an excellent device.

Reviews.Title: Works well for the price
Reviews.Author: Melissa W.
Reviews.Content: This camera works great but a light needs to be on for good vision.  The battery does not last if the temperature is below 10 degrees.  The quality of the pictures are excellent.

Reviews.Title: Great Little Product!
Reviews.Author: Tucobkg
Reviews.Content: This is a great little product. Worked as described in it's user manual. The most important thing to remember to get it functioning is the SD card. It has to be Class 6 or above! I'm using a Class 10 Micro SD card. If the card installed is a Class 4 all you will get is a blinking RED light. It won't function!I've read most of the reviews on here about the product.. Even though the vast majority are negative comments, I bought it anyway. It will be shipped to you via International shipping!I had no issues with the time stamp or anything else for that matter. Once you update the Config file it's up and running.

Reviews.Title: poor video quality, and short battery
Reviews.Author: PJ
Reviews.Content: poor vidoe quality, and the battery died after about 9 hours.  from the 9 hours, I can hardly tell the facial of the person, just that there was somehting moving in front of the camera.

Reviews.Title: The view is clear but the speech isn't
Reviews.Author: ALFRIDA J SANDERS
Reviews.Content: Haven't gotten it to hold a charge for more than 2-3 days. I bought it because it said up to 10 days. The infer red is distracting if you're trying to be discreet. If you could have the night vision without that it would be Awesome

Reviews.Title: not bad for the price
Reviews.Author: RAY SOTO
Reviews.Content: its a good gaget but it does not last 10days more like 3days on battery overall good motion activated camara

Reviews.Title: Don't waste your money.
Reviews.Author: Sam
Reviews.Content: Title says it all.This is worthless.  Worked for about one day after purchase.I won't bother sending it back.If I could, it would have given it zero stars.

Reviews.Title: Not for hiding.
Reviews.Author: LvB
Reviews.Content: Because this things puts out a red glow in true darkness, in order to be able to record in darkness, it cannot well function as any kind of hidden camera.

Reviews.Title: easy to use  met my needs
Reviews.Author: Helen Finch White
Reviews.Content: Action activated  works well  bought a larger card needed room for more pictures  I liked it and cost was reasonaable

Reviews.Title: Pretty decent
Reviews.Author: Redwood
Reviews.Content: I bought this Spy gadget because, my old roommate had a habit of coming into my room and i wanted to bust him and give himhis walking papers. Unfortunately, the camera has a 3 second delay with bright infra -red dotted all over the top half of this 3 inch camera. So, if it's noticed right away the person would have a chance to make their escape.. quality ain't the best but, for the price.. not bad. The picture may not be perfect but good enough to see any culprit ( absolutely ).

Reviews.Title: don't order from spygeargadgets
Reviews.Author: . . . AsISeeEm
Reviews.Content: I'm technologically proficient but usually use a macbook. This little wonder (and it's pretty good) arrived with a sticker on it that read something like 'lifetime service included with purchase' or something. The software you need to change the settings on the camera such as the date is on a mini-cd and I can't use one of these in my macbook without some kind of adapter. My solution was to email spygeargadgets and, after explaining the problem, asking them to just email me the small configuration program (windows only but I run Parallels on the mac).I never heard back from them.I also called several times. If you call before they open you get a recording that says 'hey we're not open!'If you call during business hours you get a message saying 'we're open but all operators are busy - leave a message!' I made several calls during the week I had this thing and was was never able to reach a person.I theorize that spygeargadgets is one guy who is pretty crappy at customer service and therefore I recommend that you not buy the camera from this company.Also you should know that this motion activated camera is not activated by motion through a window (or at least through my thick windows). Another one I ordered from Amazon will do this (that one looks like a standard motion detector but is a surveillance camera).

Reviews.Title: VERY impressed
Reviews.Author: James M.
Reviews.Content: This worked perfectly for my needs.  The "new 2012 software" made it easy to set up and use. (BE SURE your seller provides the "NEW" version, as this seller did without me asking.)  I had been having a problem with petty cash "leaking".  I "hid" this camera in plain sight 4 feet from the box.  This "plugged the leak" in just a few days time.  Problem solved.  WELL worth the money.PS:  I do agree with the other reviewer that the infrared array makes it less than completely "stealthy", but apparently my culprit was more focused on the cash than his surroundings, as the camera went unnoticed and took very clear footage in a dark office. (Your results may be different...)

Reviews.Title: Impossible to use without a manual
Reviews.Author: Zevoruko
Reviews.Content: I am really bothered that the camera came with no user manual. I seems pretty simple to use but things like the TXT and even where to insert the SD memory are not evident. I will give a better review of this product once I get it to work but without a user's manual it is simply not intuitive enough to merit a decent review.

Reviews.Title: Does great job
Reviews.Author: Nathan H.
Reviews.Content: I got the camera in pretty quick after ordering. It is kind of hard figuring out how to put the time and date stamp on it and still have not figured that out. The compartment to put the memory card in is under the battery and kind of hard to get it oriented to slide in but once it is in, you don't have to worry about it. The camera video quality is great in light but leaves a little to be desired in the dark. Over all I am pleased with it. I put it in my office because I have had stuff disappearing on the weekends so I can keep track on who comes in when I am not there. I put a piece of black electrical tape over the little light that flashes when it is recording so it doesn't draw attention to whomever comes in.

Reviews.Title: Never recorded anything
Reviews.Author: Love2shop
Reviews.Content: No matter what I tried, nothing records. Light comes on when there is motion but when I look at the memory, there is nothing there.I am very dissappointed with my purchase and will never purchase from them again.

Reviews.Title: Pretty Sharp
Reviews.Author: Pete Noftsger
Reviews.Content: Very clear video and audio. Battery life is very poor however if you place the camera in a high traffic area.  Overall...pretty satisfied with it.  Will suggest that if your trying to be covert, you can turn off the low light indicator. If you don't, this thing lights up like a light house!

Reviews.Title: not the same thing shipped,very cheap
Reviews.Author: paul Krawchuk
Reviews.Content: Was not the same as as posted,did not work,could not get any info on the product other then you could purchase it for pennies in a large amount direct from China,but wow when returned it was a 30 or 40 dollar restocking fee,go figure.

Reviews.Title: Easy to use and works great
Reviews.Author: Irene Rojas
Reviews.Content: The motion sensor works great. This camera is extremely easy to use, no installation needed. Sound and video quality is really good too. Overall a great product for the money

Reviews.Title: This is not an SPY CAMERA!
Reviews.Author: David Brea
Reviews.Content: This is a mini camera without sound recording, motion activated and night recording.If you try to hide, a bundle of yellow and reds lights are activated when recording,so, as the objective, (human/pets) will see the lights, and will take the camera.Indeed worse, night recording is easier to detect, because you can see the shining lights frommore than 10 meters.Works fine, easy setting, battery last near 1 hour of continous recording,nice to record what happened last night when you was sleeping, or what ishappening outside your car, but not for hiding,because it is imposible! because of alerts lights.Hope this helps,David.

Reviews.Title: Good product and even better customer service....
Reviews.Author: Mike in Oregon
Reviews.Content: I purchased the Mini SpyCam to find out which one of our 12 (yes, twelve!) cats was peeing where they weren't supposed-to.  Because I have a Mac, there was an initial problem getting the date/time stamp to appear because I wasn't savvy-enough to load the txt.file onto the camera's card. A smarter bloke then I could've done it, but that wasn't me.  Anyway, the customer service fellow at SpyGear Gadgets (Alex) went the extra mile for me: he offered to pre-load the settings into a new camera, ship it to me Fed-Ex and I would send the original back to him. He was a man of his word. The replacement camera arrived yesterday and -- as promised-- all the settings were intact and functional for me.The camera itself works wonderfully... we found out who the offending feline was (it was "Winky"... who knew?!)  and we couldn't have chosen a better product for this particular purpose. The price was right, the unit is self-contained and the video quality, while not stellar, is perfectly usable for our needs. Best of all, the customer service was absolutely spectacular.  Any of the "bad customer service" naysayers who've posted here surely haven't dealt with Alex!Thank you, Alex....a job well done.Michael Kolb, Sheridan, Oregon

Reviews.Title: Everything great!
Reviews.Author: Urs Schmid
Reviews.Content: Quick delivery, well packed, promised quality.The cameras work well in the dark and the integrated microphone works well.Overall happy with the purchase, thank you.

Reviews.Title: absolute rip off
Reviews.Author: Jim Eddleman
Reviews.Content: if you can figure out how to use this,,,,good luck,,,,poorest of poor directions and no tf card included,,,seriously an absolute rip off!!!!

Reviews.Title: Motion activated camera
Reviews.Author: Bosco1961

Reviews.Title: Do not buy. This thing is junk period. Does not work as advertised.

Reviews.Title: didnt need this
Reviews.Author: Mo
Reviews.Content: I never used this, I returned it prior, didnt find use for it. Also reading upon it and other reviews. I noticed the night camera infrared would have to be covered so it isnt noticeable but, then whats the purpose of the infrared night vision

Reviews.Title: Nice camera that may be available for less elsewhere on Amazon.  Some issues raised by others can be avoided.
Reviews.Author: Bob Tobias "Robert Tobias"
Reviews.Content: For the price this camera provides decent audio and video quality with a nice set of features.  However, before purchasing also consider the Dakota Alert DVR-01 IR Motion Detector & Video Recorder.As for avoiding issues (expressed by others): - The IR and record indicator lights draw attention to the camera: I cover them with 3M Scotch Super 33+ Vinyl Electrical Tape.  Any tape that blocks out the lights will work fine. Of course, covering the IR lights will affect your ability to record video in the dark. - You need to open the cover and remove the battery to access the SD card:  I use a USB cable to access the card so there's no need to do that.

Reviews.Title: Neat but not great
Reviews.Author: arunnerssole
Reviews.Content: Works fine just as others have stated, the ir lights are a dead give away if it's not strategically placed and the start up is slow so if you were attempting to see if people were say traversing your property to cut over to another alley or house you would never know who, just that someone or something activated the motion sensor

Reviews.Title: don't be scammed
Reviews.Author: P. Draper "puss-n-boots"
Reviews.Content: this is a decent little camera but whoever put a review in here that said there are knock offs must have been trying to drive business specifically to a particular store. I fell for it. paid $44.50 more and got, I'm sure, the same camera as every one that paid $69.99. there is no manufacturer on this camera nor a "made in".  it is generic.and it was an electronic store that was behind the website front that shipped it to me.pay the $69.99 and not more.  the only thing about it is that the battery does not live up to the advertisement. I keep mine plugged in and it works great. If you have to be dependent on the battery, you  might be disappointed. there is no rhyme or reason as to how long it works via battery. it seems that you have to turn it off and on periodically throughout the day to get it to work where as no problem if it is plugged in.

Reviews.Title: It works -sort of
Reviews.Author: Carolyn I. Butler "Jack of All Trades"
Reviews.Content: This little cameras is a bit hard to aim and the directions don't tell you how to set the date and time. For what I needed, it didn't really matter that much but it would be nice to now how to get it out of 2008! Nothing in the directions tells you. Other than that, it is easy to transfer the videos to your computer. If date and time don't matter, the price is right.

Reviews.Author: Alex
Reviews.Content: Don't work inside of any car will work indoors and outdoors if your planing to buy it for your this cam will not work.

Reviews.Title: Very good security camera! Works as described.
Reviews.Author: Lori Dostourian "Lori"
Reviews.Content: This is an excellent camera if you don't want internet CCTV type devices. It works exactly as stated.I tried other cameras, but his has the video micro SD card which is great because the videos just overlay prior videos.

Reviews.Title: Good cat camera
Reviews.Author: Don Mayer
Reviews.Content: This camera exceeded my expectations . Did a great job watching our cats. We wanted to find out what the cats did when we were asleep and it let us find out.

Reviews.Title: THIS IS GREAT FOR OUR OFFICE
Reviews.Author: elizabeth sawyers
Reviews.Content: LOVE THE WAY IT WORKS, MOTION DETECTION IS GREAT IN LIGHT OR DARK ROOM. GREAT BUY WOULD ADVISE ANYONE THAT WANTED AN INEXPENSIVE BUT GREAT QUALITY TO BUY THIS CAMERA!

Reviews.Title: Very good product
Reviews.Author: L Johnston
Reviews.Content: Very happy with it. It was hard to set up with my computer ,but the camer takes great pictures.I would give it a5 star if the set up was easier

Reviews.Title: Arrived on time and as promised, thanks.
Reviews.Author: cjs
Reviews.Content: Be sure to put in cradle as shown.  First time I did not and all images were upside down.  Quick learn.

Reviews.Title: Not what I expected.
Reviews.Author: Edwin Barnes
Reviews.Content: The video is horrible and there is no night vision. It picks up your body heat but records dark. You can not see anything in the dark or in low. I wish I could return it for a refund. This was a waiste of my money. It did not do any of the functions in its advertisement. The video in regular light is so grainey that it is bad on the eyes.

Reviews.Title: Battery Life a total lie
Reviews.Author: Eric Munson
Reviews.Content: I have two of these that I have tried using for almost a week now and each day they start with a full charge.  They are triggered about every 15-20 minutes and the last video I see starts 2 hours after I turn the device on.  The battery life is a total crock, don't waste your money on these.

Reviews.Title: Great camera!!
Reviews.Author: Andrea
Reviews.Content: The camera worked great for me and even has night vision and sound, so I was very pleased with it.  I also like that it is small, so it is barely noticeable as a hidden camera!!

Reviews.Title: Waste of money
Reviews.Author: Leah Petro
Reviews.Content: I could never get this to work.  The directions are HORRIBLE, and even help from the internet from others who actually managed to figure it out was useless.

Reviews.Title: battery leads broke 2nd month
Reviews.Author: THE SHIZNIT
Reviews.Content: battery works great the first time around. second time around i noticed the leads on my battery busted and so now i have find a solution since the cam wont charge.

Reviews.Title: Overpriced, falsely advertised, CD may damage your MAC!
Reviews.Author: E.J. from CA
Reviews.Content: Amazon.com, shame on you! This is by far one of the worst purchases I've ever made on Amazon and I am amazed that Amazon would soil its name with a product like this. If the product description simply read "cheap lo-def motion sensor camera," it would basically be correct. Despite what the adverting says, this product is NOT MAC COMPATIBLE. Repeat: NOT MAC COMPATIBLE. The mini-cd that comes with this toy (and it is a TOY) cannot fit into most Mac slide-in disc drives. Also, even if you happen to have a mini-cd adaptor (or a DVD/CD reader that pops out to receive disks), once the program is uploaded into the camera, the programing software used to configure the settings cannot work on any Mac OS. So, "mac-compatable" is a complete lie in the advertising. As for the quality of picture this toy captures, everything looks like sepia-toned Bigfoot footage. Good luck getting any face, license plate, or useful physical features with this product. Other problems: The camera is COMPLETELY INEFFECTIVE THROUGH WINDOWS no matter how clean the window is. So, if you're trying to capture something outside your home, you'd literally have to place the camera outside, where it could be easily discovered thus defeating the whole purpose capturing someone's activity unaware. And why would someone find the camera? Because, the camera CANNOT BE HIDDEN!  When the red night-vision lights activate, they can be seen from as far as 150 feet (So again, false advertising for this being a "spy" or "hidden" camera. Isn't this much false advertising illegal?). And what do you get with this incredible night-vision technology? NIGHT-VISION THAT LOOKS LIKE ITS FROM A CAMERA MADE INTHE 80s--grainy, unfocused, blurry. And the AUDIO SOUNDS LIKE AN ADULT CHARACTER IN A PEANUTS CARTOON--words indistinguishable and incomprehensible. THERE IS NO 16-PAGE INSTRUCTION BOOKLET. Yet another lie! There is one (1) sheet of instructions coming with the camera (as well as a completely useless pdf on the mini-cd--a whole three pages of 24 font size text)  full of pigeon English and confusing instruction. This product is obviously FOREIGN MADE AND PACKAGED.  The package itself is completely different from the one shown on Amazon. Also, THERE IS NO LIFETIME 1800 TECH SUPPORT. Yet another 'nother lie! There's no number or address anywhere on the product for customer support, and NO WARRANTY INFO OR CERTIFICATE. And, finally, the price. Are you kidding me? For nearly $120, I expected a top-quality product that at least delivered what it promised in the product description. In reality, this camera is worth about $29.99 and should be sold and described as such. Great for kids who like gadget toys, but useless for any type of serious surveillance. DO NOT BUY!WARNING! ATTEMPTING TO INSERT MINI-CD INTO SOME MACINTOSH COMPUTER MODELS CAN RESULT IN DISK BEING STUCK IN DISK DRIVE!

Reviews.Title: I do not think it works well at all..... Battery life is VERY poor.
Reviews.Author: BOB WENGER
Reviews.Content: I feel this is a waste of money, the battery life is about .5 hrs, not very long at all. I should have returned it....... :-/

Reviews.Title: Not impressed
Reviews.Author: Kris Currier
Reviews.Content: Worked great for first 3 or 4 days. Then the video recording started making chirping noise when I tried to view what was on SD card. Video choppy at best. Motion detector was great. Need a different color though. It was spotted pretty fast.. Time and date stamp were set at 2008, and times incorrect. I had to put a piece of tape and color it black over the led light. Way to bright.

Reviews.Title: SpygearGadgets Motion-Activated Camera with Night Vision and 10-Day Battery...
Reviews.Author: Namazon
Reviews.Content: Well if you think to use this Motion-Activated Camera with Night Vision and 10-Day Battery... to spy a mouse in your kitchen or a rodent in the backyard this is a super good Cam as it said but not for spying a person because the LED and Infrared lites are easy noticeable so that person can grasp it n go awạy LOL.

Reviews.Title: It works; but, not well
Reviews.Author: Tom M (Kensington, MD) "Tom M"
Reviews.Content: My first camera was DOA; but, the vendor willingly replaced it.  While it is what it claims to be, a night vision automatic camera, the range and quality are so poor that it's essentially useless for any serious applications where identification of intruders,etc. would be important.  That's a shame.  Because it is a great size and the 10 day charge would be a great asset.SpyGearGadgets (SpyTech) was very responsive to my issues with the first camera so I am pleased with the vendor.  Would recommend the vendor.  But, would not, however, recommend the camera.  Even so, I can't even fault the product description as it works as described for limited applications.  It just didn't meet my own requirements all that well.

Reviews.Title: Defective
Reviews.Author: E M Hammond
Reviews.Content: Hello:I couldn't get my adorable little camera to work.  It would not input into my computer with the 'cord'.I took it to a camera shop and they had the mini-SD Card it was missing.  But it still wouldn't work.After I 'finally' received it back, I tried to email you, but all your pages kept telling me to select things that were of no consequence, and then would send me back to your home page to start all over again.I love the little camera, but it doesn't work.  Now, yesterday when I tried again to contact you, I was told it was too late...I'm very disappointed.  I wanted to trade my little camera in for a replacement just like it - only working.Marie Hammond

Reviews.Title: Very Difficult to Set Up
Reviews.Author: Joseph M. Canon "Phoenix"
Reviews.Content: I got this over a month ago, and it was incredibly difficult to set up.  Requires a memory chip that would not click into place.  Finally gave up, and set it aside.  Not sure if I want to waste more time trying to figure this poorly designed gizmo, or try for something else.  Not sure if the model I got was defective or not.  Huge disappointment.

Reviews.Title: should not be spygear
Reviews.Author: debbie l morris
Reviews.Content: Taped small red light but large motion detector button lights up also. It was spotted immediately, so it was a waste of money for me.

Reviews.Title: missing SD card
Reviews.Author: Christopher B.
Reviews.Content: My star rating really isn't applicable.  I did not get to try the product because the SD card was not present.  I just returned the item.  I have one of these already and was looking forward to getting another one but was disappointed. I can tell you that the one I do have is great so if you can get one with the SD card I think you'll be happy with it.

Reviews.Title: Camera Sucks!!!
Reviews.Author: wonderman6000
Reviews.Content: the "NIGHT VISION" is a joke don't purchase this p.o.s . after dark all you see is darkness. do not buy

Reviews.Title: Couldn't get it to work right
Reviews.Author: Boobear500
Reviews.Content: Just couldn't get it to work right.I followed the directions and it didn't work.Sent it back...that's all she wrote

Reviews.Title: It's just an expensive useless toy, don't waste your money
Reviews.Author: Abraham
Reviews.Content: It's not a spy camera, it has a red light that flash every time the camera is recording so it's very easy to detected. It take 3 seconds to activate so the video shows only part of the scene and finally there is no way to keep the camera recording  with no stop the video evey 30 seconds or 1 minute, so the video is constantly cutting with long gaps. I really don't know what's the real used of this camera, it's just an expensive useless toy .
